entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Sarnia
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:03 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 2.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sarnia Chris Hadfield Airport 07:44 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 2.3°C
Pressure: 99.9 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 91 %
Dewpoint: 1.0°C
Wind: ESE 32 km/h gust 45 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: A few showers. High 13.
entry.summary: Showers. Risk of a thunderstorm this afternoon. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southwest 50 gusting to 80 this afternoon. High 13. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries changing to 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 30 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High 8.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 8. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
